summary: This document is a secure message from TD Ameritrade regarding a transfer request made by Jeffrey Epstein. It confirms the receipt of the transfer request and outlines the next steps in the processing of the request, including potential follow-up for additional information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual who submitted a transfer request to TD Ameritrade.

persons.name: David Redlinger
persons.context: David Redlinger is the representative from TD Ameritrade who communicated with Epstein regarding the transfer request.

persons.name: Chad
persons.context: Chad is mentioned as the account holder associated with the transfer request.

connections.description: David Redlinger is providing services to Jeffrey Epstein regarding his transfer request.
Chad is associated with the account that is involved in the transfer request made by Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Transfer Request Submission
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein submitted a transfer request to TD Ameritrade for processing.

keyFacts: The document is a secure message from TD Ameritrade confirming the receipt of a transfer request from Jeffrey Epstein.
David Redlinger is the representative who communicated with Epstein regarding the transfer.
The transfer request involves an account titled 'Southern Financial LLC' and a transfer to Deutsche Bank.
